author: sky.cactus
content: Large price swings have historically lead to surprises in the ice age timing.  Someone should recalculate when the ice age is given the recent price swing.

author: timbeiko
content: <@!301186049323958275> yeah I was talking with the author of this script (https://github.com/TrueBlocks/tokenomics/tree/main/explorations/difficulty) who confirmed the July ETA this week

author: sorcer1163
content: Historically, any update has always been delayed. Given the current pressure on the network, letting the ice age kick in will have really, really big impact on the network. I suggest implementing an EIP in Berlin that kicks it forward at least to the fall. Gives you enough time to do another hardfork without rushing.

author: ralexstokes
content: i feel like someone here can point me to a tool that lets me compute the distribution of opcodes across a span of blocks

author: ralexstokes
content: e.g. "how many times does the `DIFFICULTY` opcode appear in all executions from block N....M"
